resources.string:
By using the FLEX Android App, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
Data Handling:
FLEX collects and stores user data solely for the purpose of providing services and improving user experience.
User data is protected by secure encryption and stored on a secure server.
FLEX does not sell or share user data with any third parties.
Terms of Use:
The FLEX Android App is provided "as is" and is intended for use as an EMG therapy log to monitor patient\'s progress across their treatment of the Neurogenic disease.
Users of the FLEX Android App are solely responsible for the accuracy and completeness of the data they provide.
FLEX is not responsible for any consequences that may arise from the use of the app.
Privacy Policy:
FLEX respects user privacy and is committed to protecting user data.
FLEX collects user data solely for the purpose of providing services and improving user experience.
FLEX does not sell or share user data with any third parties.
FLEX may use user data for research purposes but will always anonymize the data before using it for research.
Users can request to access, modify or delete their data by contacting FLEX support.
By using the FLEX Android App, you agree to the above terms and conditions.
